array.string: Increases ranged and tech critical chance by 2%.
Increases ranged and tech critical chance by 4%.
Increases ranged and tech critical chance by 6%.
Reduces the activation time of Rapid Scan by 0.25 and reduces the cooldown of Healing Scan by 1.5.
Reduces the activation time of Rapid Scan by 0.5 and reduces the cooldown of Healing Scan by 3.
Vent Heat now immediately vents an additional 8 heat.
Vent Heat now immediately vents an additional 16 heat.
Critical results with damage and healing abilities have a 50% chance to grant Critical Reaction, increasing alacrity by 5% for 6.
Critical results with damage and healing abilities have a 100% chance to grant Critical Reaction, increasing alacrity by 5% for 12.

Converts 30 charges of Combat Support Cylinder to supercharge your blasters, venting 16 heat and increasing all damage and healing dealt by 10% for 10. While active, the following abilities gain Supercharge effects: Power Shot: Heat cost reduced by 17. Unload: Heat cost reduced by 8. Healing Scan: Cooldown reduced by 100%. Kolto Missile: Places a shield on all targets, reducing damage taken by 10% for 15 seconds.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 35% and reduces the threat generated by healing abilities by 5%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 70% and reduces the threat generated by healing abilities by 10%.
Increases the healing done by Rapid Scan and Healing Scan by 3%. In addition, Rapid Scan builds 3 charges of Combat Support Cylinder.
Increases the healing done by Rapid Scan and Healing Scan by 6%. In addition, Rapid Scan builds 6 charges of Combat Support Cylinder.
Energy Shield now further decreases ability activation pushback by 30% and makes you immune to interrupts.
Heals up to 3 allies within 8 meters of the targeted area for ?.
Kolto Bomb has a 50% chance to leave Kolto Residue on affected targets, increasing all healing received by 5% for 15 seconds.
Kolto Bomb has a 50% chance to leave Kolto Residue on affected targets, increasing all healing received by 5% for 15 seconds.
Reduces the heat cost of Jet Boost, Concussion Missile and Electro Dart by 8.
Increases all healing received by 10% while Energy Shield is active.
Increases all healing received by 20% while Energy Shield is active.
Healing Scan has a 33.34% chance to reduce the heat cost of your next Rapid Scan by 16.
Healing Scan has a 66.68% chance to reduce the heat cost of your next Rapid Scan by 16.
Healing Scan has a 100.02% chance to reduce the heat cost of your next Rapid Scan by 16.
Reduces all damage taken by 2% while Combat Support Cylinder is active.
Reduces all damage taken by 4% while Combat Support Cylinder is active.
Reduces the heat cost of Cure by 8. In addition, Cure now removes negative mental effects.

Deploys a kolto shell around the target that has 10 charges and lasts 5 minutes. When damaged, the kolto shell loses 1 charge and heals the target for ?. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds. Only one Kolto Shell can be deployed at a time.
Healing Scan has a 50% chance to apply Proactive Medicine to the target, healing for an additional 9 over ?.
Healing Scan has a 100% chance to apply Proactive Medicine to the target, healing for an additional 18 over ?.
Proactive Medicine now also provides 10% armor while active.
Increases the critical healing bonus of all heals by 3%.
Increases the critical healing bonus of all heals by 6%.
Increases the critical healing bonus of all heals by 9%.
Increases the critical healing bonus of all heals by 12%.
Increases the critical healing bonus of all heals by 15%.
Instantly heals a friendly target for 234 - 401.
Increases healing received by 1% and all healing done by ?%.
Increases healing received by 2% and all healing done by ?%.
Increases the damage dealt by all missiles and Power Shot by 3% and the healing dealt by Kolto Missile by 10%.
Increases the damage dealt by all missiles and Power Shot by 6% and the healing dealt by Kolto Missile by 20%.
Increases Endurance by 1% and all healing received by 3%.
Increases Endurance by 2% and all healing received by 6%.

Increases the effects of your gas cylinders while they are active: Combustible Gas Cylinder: Increases tech critical hit chance by 3%. High Velocity Gas Cylinder: Reduces the heat cost of Rail Shot by 8. Combat Support Cylinder: Increases tech critical hit chance by ?%.
Reduces the heat cost of Power Shot and Tracer Missile by 9.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Power Shot, Concussion Missile, Tracer Missile and Unload by 25%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Power Shot, Concussion Missile, Tracer Missile and Unload by 50%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Power Shot, Concussion Missile, Tracer Missile and Unload by 75%.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Unload and Heatseeker Missiles by 15%.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Unload and Heatseeker Missiles by 30%.

Launches a missile at the target that deals (current weapon) kinetic damage and applies a heat signature, reducing the armor rating by 4% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times. Heat signatures leave the target vulnerable to Rail Shot.
Rocket Punch has a 50% chance to knock the target back several meters. In addition, Jet Boost's knockback effect is stronger and pushes enemies 2 meters further away.
Rocket Punch has a 100% chance to knock the target back several meters. In addition, Jet Boost's knockback effect is stronger and pushes enemies 4 meters further away.
Power Shot and Tracer Missile have a 50% chance to generate a Power Barrier that reduces damage taken by 2% for ?. Stacks up to 5 times.
Power Shot and Tracer Missile have a 100% chance to generate a Power Barrier that reduces damage taken by 2% for ?. Stacks up to 5 times.
While High Velocity Gas Cylinder is active, critical hits with missiles and Unload have a 50% chance to vent 8 heat. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
While High Velocity Gas Cylinder is active, critical hits with missiles and Unload have a 100% chance to vent 8 heat. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
Tracer Missile now applies an additional heat signature.
Reduces the cooldown of Jet Boost by 5 and Determination by 15.
Reduces the cooldown of Jet Boost by 10 and Determination by 30.
Vent Heat regenerates 7% of your maximum health over 10 seconds.
Tracer Missile grants Target Lock, increasing the damage dealt by the next Rail Shot by 6%. Stacks up to 5 times.
Increases the damage dealt by Unload by 33%.
Unload has a 50% chance per hit to slow the target's movement by 50% for 2 seconds.
Unload has a 100% chance per hit to slow the target's movement by 50% for 2 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Concussion Missile by 7.5 seconds and Thermal Sensor Override by 15 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Concussion Missile by 15 seconds and Thermal Sensor Override by 30 seconds.
Power Shot and Tracer Missile have a 10% chance to finish the cooldown on Unload and increase the damage dealt by the next Unload by 25%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Power Shot and Tracer Missile have a 20% chance to finish the cooldown on Unload and increase the damage dealt by the next Unload by 25%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Power Shot and Tracer Missile have a 30% chance to finish the cooldown on Unload and increase the damage dealt by the next Unload by 25%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Fires several missiles that deal (current weapon) kinetic damage. This damage is increased by 5% per heat signature on the target.
Increases ranged and tech accuracy by 1%.
Increases ranged and tech accuracy by 2%.
Increases ranged and tech accuracy by 3%.
You have a 50% chance to vent 8 heat when stunned, immobilized, knocked down or otherwise incapacitated.
You have a 100% chance to vent 8 heat when stunned, immobilized, knocked down or otherwise incapacitated.
Combustible Gas Cylinder has a 2% chance when it applies its effects to reduce the movement speed of the target by 50% for 50 seconds.
Combustible Gas Cylinder has a 4% chance when it applies its effects to reduce the movement speed of the target by 50% for 100 seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by Combustible Gas Cylinder by 10% and its chance to be triggered by 2%.
Increases the damage dealt by Combustible Gas Cylinder by 20% and its chance to be triggered by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by Combustible Gas Cylinder by 30% and its chance to be triggered by 6%.
Increases stealth detection by 1, melee and ranged defense by 2.5%, and reduces the cooldown of Stealth Scan by ? seconds.
Increases stealth detection by 2, melee and ranged defense by 5%, and reduces the cooldown of Stealth Scan by ? seconds.
Fires a missile that explodes on contact, igniting the target for (current weapon) elemental damage and an additional (current weapon) elemental damage over 18.

Rail Shot ignores 50% of the target's armor. In addition, if Rail Shot hits a burning target, it has a 15% chance to vent 8 heat and refresh the duration of your Combustible Gas Cylinder's burn effect if present.

Rail Shot ignores 100% of the target's armor. In addition, if Rail Shot hits a burning target, it has a 30% chance to vent 8 heat and refresh the duration of your Combustible Gas Cylinder's burn effect if present.
Energy Shield has a 50% chance to remove all movement-impairing effects when activated.
Energy Shield has a 100% chance to remove all movement-impairing effects when activated.
Power Shot has a 10% chance and Unload has a 20% chance to finish the cooldown on Rail Shot and make the next Rail Shot free.
Power Shot has a 20% chance and Unload has a 40% chance to finish the cooldown on Rail Shot and make the next Rail Shot free.
Power Shot has a 30% chance and Unload has a 60% chance to finish the cooldown on Rail Shot and make the next Rail Shot free.
Reduces the cooldown of Vent Heat by 15.
Reduces the cooldown of Vent Heat by 30.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Combustible Gas Cylinder, Rail Shot, Incendiary Missile and Thermal Detonator by 15%.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Combustible Gas Cylinder, Rail Shot, Incendiary Missile and Thermal Detonator by 30%.
Rapid Shots, Power Shot, Rail Shot, Unload and Sweeping Blasters deal 3% additional damage to burning targets.
Rapid Shots, Power Shot, Rail Shot, Unload and Sweeping Blasters deal 6% additional damage to burning targets.
Rapid Shots, Power Shot, Rail Shot, Unload and Sweeping Blasters deal 9% additional damage to burning targets.
When you take damage, you have 50% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Energy Shield by 1.5. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
When you take damage, you have 100% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Energy Shield by 3. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Increases tech critical hit chance by 1% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 10% on targets below 30% max health.
Increases tech critical hit chance by 2% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 20% on targets below 30% max health.
Increases tech critical hit chance by 3% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 30% on targets below 30% max health.
Critical hits have a 50% chance to reduce the active cooldown on Kolto Overload and Thermal Sensor Override by 3. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Critical hits have a 100% chance to reduce the active cooldown on Kolto Overload and Thermal Sensor Override by 6. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.

Hurls a thermal detonator that adheres to the target and detonates after several seconds. Standard and weak enemies enter a state of panic while the explosive is active. The explosion deals (current weapon) kinetic damage when it detonates. Standard and weak targets are knocked back from the blast. Shares a 15-second cooldown with Explosive Dart.
